name: Christmas Santa Doctor Games - Boys & Girls Game
name_original: Christmas Santa Doctor Games - Boys & Girls Game
description:
Oh no! Santa and friends need your help for Christmas!! Play fun holiday levels with Santa, elf, snowman and more!

Level 1: Help shave and clean up Santa! Use the tools on the bench to clean him up for Christmas! Trim his beard and watch it magically regrow!! Comb hair, add Santa's glasses, hat and more!

Level 2: Clean the elf!! The elf was playing in the candy room and got messy! Help clean up, brush hair, put on elf hat, apply make-up and more!

Level 3: Dentist time! Take the snowman to the dentist! Brush teeth, use floss tool and don't forget to add the carrot nose & snow hat!

Level 4: Help the Gingerbread friend!! Use the fan to cool off, then decorate by adding frosting & bow tie, cook the gingerbread, use the magic sparkle wand and much more!

Level 5: The puppy was playing and got dirty! Help to clean up the puppy! Spray the bugs, clip puppy nails, remove candy pieces and more! Bark!

*Level 6: Go outside and help the pink princess elf! Comb her hair, clean up the candy, put on Christmas hat and more!

*Level 7: Paint ice princess nails at the salon! Cut her hair, remove old nail polish, sew the ripped dress, put on ice princess Tiara and much more!

*Level 8: It's snowing outside! Help clean the reindeer then prepare for the sleigh! Add a red nose, antlers, Santa hat and more!

*Level 9: Oh no! The sleigh is stuck in the snow! Use the shovel to remove the snow, fix the sleigh, then get ready for Santa!

*Level 10: Brrrr...It is cold outside and Santa needs your help! Add Santa gloves and blanket. Comb the reindeer pet hair! Then add the bag of toys and get ready for Christmas!! Merry Christmas!

*Please note that Levels 6-10 must be purchased separately.
*Please note that Shave Santa & Play Doctor is free to play, but you are able to purchase game items and remove ads with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.*
